WELCOME.MESSAGE: Welcome to Guitarbox! This mobile app is designed to facilitate guitar practice and learning by offering features such as a metronome, tuner, and a collection of song sheets. We're excited to have you on board. Let's get started with the initial setup of the app.

MIC.MESSAGE: To fully utilize the tuner feature in Guitarbox, we need your permission to access the microphone on your device.

ALERT.MESSAGE: It appears you haven't granted microphone permission. The tuner feature requires microphone access. You can manually grant permissions in your device's settings when you're ready.

INSTRUMENT.MESSAGE: Now it's time to select the instrument you want to work with in Guitarbox.
INSTRUMENT.NOTE: However, please note that you can change the instrument at any time in the app's settings.

SETUP.EXIT: Press the button to exit the setup

ALERT.MESSAGE: It appears you haven't granted microphone permission. The tuner feature requires microphone access. You can manually grant permissions in your device's settings.

SHEETS.NO_CHORDS: At the moment, this song doesn't have chords.

DISCONNECTED: No connection. Please check your internet connection.
